title: Valdis Story: Abyssal City

title: Valdis Story: Abyssal City
notes: Can also confirm that an XBOne controller works. No issues whatsoever.

cpu: AMD A8-6410 APU with AMD Radeon R5 Graphics
notes: Everything works fine, I used a save file and explored the whole map. Turning on Dinput on options made the keyboard to not work. I had to disconnect my controller then restart the game and turn the Dinput option off. Used steam controller overlay to play.
title: Valdis Story: Abyssal City

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Generic usb controller doesn't work properly in the menus. Everything else is perfect.
title: Valdis Story: Abyssal City

cpu: AMD A9-9410 RADEON R5, 5 COMPUTE CORES 2C+3G
notes: Played 12 hours with ds4 controller with zero issues whatsoever.
title: Valdis Story: Abyssal City

notes: In fullscreen mode, avoid changing window. Otherwise the game will be the display area will be reduced to a few pixel square in lower left of your screen
